Class Gear

  • java.lang.Object
    • Gear
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Boots, Chest, Pants

    public abstract class Gear
extends java.lang.Object
    The Gear class represents the parent class of the subtypes of gear. A user can select which type of gear to equip. Each type of gear has it's own type of bonus to the character that is unique to that piece of gear.
    Author:
    David Iacono CSC 212 Brown 04/16/2013
